attributes.action: We demand our government put pressure on the ICC to try Netanyahu for war crimes
attributes.additional_details: If the government of the United Kingdom can punish Saddam Hussain and Muammar Gadaffi for war crimes and crimes against humanity and against their people, we can punish the terrorists and extremists for terrorism, we can punish people for murder so how and why can we blindly turn an eye to the injustice suffered by the Palestinians at the hands of Benjamin Netanyanu & his Israeli government, how & why can we let this man get away with dusproportionate murder, WE CANNOT LET HIM GET AWAY WITH THIS
attributes.background: The Prime Minister of Israel has used his power and influence to authorise disproportionate murderous attacks on Palestinians and illegally occupy Palestinian land, he cannot be arrested in the UK but he can & must be tried at the international criminal court for war crimes & crimes against humanity
